name: Star Wench
description:
STAR WENCH is a choose your own death adventure - open up to a page, any page, and read what fate befalls you. You're Star Wench, the interstellar adventurer and rogue - your opponent, the unbeatable Queen of Space. You can't win. How will you lose?

This digital version of a print book (available on Amazon!) attempts to replicate as much of the experience of the print book as possible. Pick any page off the menu, or use the "random" button to choose one you haven't seen before. The "last page" button functions as a bookmark.

Digital Star Wench has been updated to include the ten additional endings from the follow-up zine ESCAPE FROM THE SHACKLES OF NARRATIVE! That's 110 endings total with 23 illustrations by a bunch of different artists!

Note: You're buying a Windows executable or a Mac app, not an ebook - it's not designed with Kindle or the Iphone or whatever in mind.
